name: School Backpack
description: A durable and spacious school backpack designed to carry books, stationery, and a laptop. It features multiple compartments for organized storage, padded straps for comfort, and a water-resistant exterior for added protection.

name: Longway Black Table Fan
description: The Longway Black Table Fan provides efficient cooling with its powerful motor and adjustable speed settings. It features a sleek black design, oscillation function for widespread air distribution, and a compact size perfect for desktops and small spaces.

name: TABLE MATE Strong & Sturdy Highest
description: The TABLE MATE is a versatile and sturdy adjustable table, ideal for various activities like eating, reading, and working. It features a strong build, adjustable height and angle, and a foldable design for easy storage and portability.

name: LG Double Door Refrigerator
description: The LG Double Door Refrigerator offers ample storage space with separate compartments for fresh and frozen foods.

name: Nike Superfly 9 Elite Mercurial
description: The Nike Superfly 9 Elite Mercurial soccer cleats are designed for speed and agility on the field.

name: Woodland Mens LeatherCasual Shoe
description: Woodland Men's Leather Casual Shoes combine rugged durability with stylish design. Made from high-quality leather, these shoes offer comfort, a sturdy grip, and a versatile look suitable for both casual outings and outdoor adventures.

name: Men's Jackets
description: Men's jackets come in various styles, from lightweight windbreakers to heavy-duty winter coats.

name: SMM Camera DSLR canon Latest
description: The latest Canon DSLR camera offers advanced features for photography enthusiasts and professionals. It includes a high-resolution sensor, fast autofocus, 4K video recording.
